title: PokerWorld365
author: PokerWorld365
created_time: June 04, 2023, 10:31:52 AMLast edit: June 11, 2023, 04:53:45 PM by PokerWorld365
content: In a world where poker knows no boundaries, the global PokerWorld365 Union is a tight-knit club of clubs, where hearts may break and diamonds may shine, but the spades always hold the ace up their sleeves.üÉè Join the PokerWorld365 Union, led by the esteemed home club, PokerWorld365! üåçüïí Experience the thrill of online poker games around the clock, 24/7. No matter the time or day, we've got the tables open for you!üí∞ Enjoy seamless transactions with problem-free deposits and withdrawals. Our user-friendly website supports multiple cryptocurrencies, ensuring convenience at every step.üîç Dive deep into the world of each club within our Union. Explore their unique offerings, game styles, and exclusive features on their personal information pages.üí¨ Need more information? Our dedicated agents are here to assist you! Chat with them to get detailed insights into each club, helping you make the perfect choice.üéØ It's time to find your ideal club(s) and take your poker journey to the next level. Visit us today and let the PokerWorld365 Union bring the excitement straight to your screen! ‚ô†Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô£Ô∏è‚ô¶Ô∏è

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Correct me if I‚Äôm wrong, Is this casino only available on mobile application by downloading it on playstore and appstore? I don‚Äôt see any registration button on the website as well as the poker room itself to browse the game.The only feature available on the website is the withdrawal and deposit. I‚Äôm confused on how your casino works if the website version is possible. Nevertheless this is like pokerstar application but the only difference is you are accepting Bitcoin as deposit. How many players is your average active daily player?Welcome in the forum!

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, since you're accepting Bitcoin, you're fine.I see you're asking the player to download your casino named GG Poker, does your project has a relation with this project? https://en.ggpoker.com/Not many people are favor to install an unknown application due to risk of privacy and security, you should have a way to let people to play poker using browser. Do you really not asking KYC? I don't find a terms about it.Your google play and app store images has no link, you need to update it.

comments.author: QueenVera
comments.body: Welcome to the forum and it seems one needs to install your poker from the Google play store and it also caught my attention that you never mentioned about kyc which has being one of the major challenges in the gambling industry late since after the government¬† made restrictions to gambling and it will be nice if you make your kyc¬† terms open and friendly as well and since you accept bitcoin, I think you might have some nice try and I want to welcome to the forum.You might also want to consider some form of marketing¬† in firm of signature¬† campaigns¬† or bounty campaigns¬† and just incase you do, do well to check @Hhampuz as his one of the best managers you can think of in the forum.

comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Quote from: Jawhead999 on June 04, 2023, 10:48:41 AM-snip-Not many people are favor to install an unknown application due to risk of privacy and security, you should have a way to let people to play poker using browser. Do you really not asking KYC? I don't find a terms about it.Your google play and app store images has no link, you need to update it.I have also looked for them and I have not found the T&Cs, Privacy Policy, etc. These links/documents are fundamental for the users in order to make informed decisions. OP, consider including these details if you want to be perceived as a serious casino by the most veteran members of this forum. Your graphics and layout are great so far, but it seems that you lack the most important legal backing for your services.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk.I can't find any registration or login page on your website just some write up about what you plan to bring to the poker industry nothing else that could help us understand you more.And even the playstore and Appstore image which are supposed to be embedded with links are empty in other words there is no way for us to register and check out your poker site. I would take this as an unfinished project, please fix the complaint the has been made on the thread because as it stands now your site is nothing more than a blog.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: I'm confused, your website says we need to download "GG Poker" on the google app store or apple store, but the app shown on the "joining process" is called "PP Poker", and if you search GG Poker on google app store they'll show you "ClubGG Poker" but if you search "PP Poker" you will be directed to the actual "PP Poker" app, so which app are we supposed to download?

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: You didn't put more light on the withdrawal and deposit aspect of this into your content, it may surprise you that in every words written here what would interest people the most is about your withdrawal and deposit aspect because gamers doesn't want to hear any delay or even the website request for users personal details to make withdrawals at first. I don't know if this others have brought this to your notice.Then lastly, this is a new site launched to this forum and I would want you to run some promotion by launching a signature campaign which would give your project more visibility across the forum, to carry out this action I will suggest to contact @Juler12 ¬†and CryptopreneurBrainboss for effective management and gain the best turnaround for your project.Once again welcome to the forum

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Glad to see that there is a poker site on this bitcointalk forum, I happen to like poker games, I still want to see what's interesting about your site, as I can see there is a tournament that looks tempting for me to be able to participate in to test my ability to play poker, moreover there is promotions for freerolls nice to hear that.Your account is already a copper member that's been pretty good promoting and introducing your site in this forum, taking a closer look there seems to be an app for mobile but it's not available it seems for now, maybe I'll come back later and follow any updates in this thread, congrats came on the forums

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk.I visited your site but just noticed that if people want to play poker, they have to download your site's app and register through the app.I don't think introducing a site's a great idea, but people can only access the games through an app. Usually, these sites are launched first in the form of a website and after running for a while, they introduce an application mode that can be installed on phones. But maybe this is a strategy you want to implement for your site.Well, good luck @OP. I also haven't been able to download the app via Google PlayStore because the link isn't available yet.

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: Welcome to this forum @OP, hope you enjoy in this forum and can cooperate with every users.Quote from: QueenVera on June 04, 2023, 10:56:04 AMYou might also want to consider some form of marketing¬† in firm of signature¬† campaigns¬† or bounty campaigns¬† and just incase you do, do well to check @Hhampuz as his one of the best managers you can think of in the forum. Although signature campaign is good for promotion in this forum, but I curious do there's a lot users are playing poker?I think not many users have a good skill in poker and they're not interested too, so I doubt if the impact will be huge for them. Only SWC poker and Betnomi are quite popular, but it's not really popular like gambling site focus in slots.So I'd suggest @OP to add slots or sports.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: ethereumhunter on June 04, 2023, 02:28:41 PMWelcome to Bitcointalk.I visited your site but just noticed that if people want to play poker, they have to download your site's app and register through the app.I don't think introducing a site's a great idea, but people can only access the games through an app. Usually, these sites are launched first in the form of a website and after running for a while, they introduce an application mode that can be installed on phones. But maybe this is a strategy you want to implement for your site.Well, good luck @OP. I also haven't been able to download the app via Google PlayStore because the link isn't available yet.If the OP is reading some suggestions here, they can also create this game using the desktop version.Some people prefer to play this game with bigger screen and not thru the mobile app.Also, with the news about malware from apps, some people won't just install any app on their phone.Better launch this game in different platforms so players can choose which one they want to play with.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Its a gambling site app, which I think look ok.Though still need to do some research about this site. Its better if you can just put the highlights of this sites especially the current promotions since not all will download the apps right away, might try this one though since I also like to play poker and playing with the apps seems more comfortable. Anyone here already tried playing with this site?

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: I can not find a download link to download the APP.Quote from: Jawhead999 on June 04, 2023, 10:48:41 AMYour google play and app store images has no link, you need to update it.The APP store APP link is not there too. May be they have not yet listed them on both App store and Google play. The last register time on Whois lookup is showing 2023-05-06 which means the domain is only a month old. Hopefully they are working to list the apps on the marketplaces.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Helena Yu on June 04, 2023, 02:40:53 PMAlthough signature campaign is good for promotion in this forum, but I curious do there's a lot users are playing poker?I think not many users have a good skill in poker and they're not interested too, so I doubt if the impact will be huge for them. Only SWC poker and Betnomi are quite popular, but it's not really popular like gambling site focus in slots.So I'd suggest @OP to add slots or sports.Most people that i know who came to trade cryptocurrencies in early days had a long texas hold'em background. I would even call them experts (compared to me) as they ended up in high places in tournaments. Many of them were even playing in live games (not trough net). I guess crypto attracts certain type of people, who want to make money but enjoy the risk as well or the "game" of it. I know it attracted me and i had some live poker tournament background as well.

comments.author: slapper
comments.body: So, your digital stomping ground is housed in a mobile app, much like PokerStars, only with the added sparkle of Bitcoin for deposits - you can snag it on Playstore and Appstore, correct? Yet, I notice a bit of a pickle. There's no clear 'Register' call to action on your site - just deposit and withdrawal details sitting pretty. Is this your grand strategy, or are you cooking up a website-based version?Your project vibes like GG Poker. Any connection or just parallel evolution? Just a thought, but browser-based poker could be a good play, considering some folks might be leery about downloading a mystery app, thanks to those pesky privacy and security goblins.As for the KYC, your terms are as clear as mud. Is it mandatory? Also, it would be super if you could share the daily active player count - would give future users an idea of the action.Lastly, it looks like your Google Play and App Store pics have gone AWOL. A little touch-up here could help your users jump right into your app without a hiccup. Good luck with your gig, champ! Eager to see your moves in the face of these questions and pointers.

comments.author: Chikito
comments.body: This is a fresh gambling site where domain create a month ago, and I am pretty sure they still don't have an application like link download, login button, Toc, and faq. This site still has to develop. PokerWorld365 is try to sell the name first and uses a curious trick to make you come to their site. but, if not fast and late to make it able to play, the user will forget this. Better for to OP make test mode before make it able to download.

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Quote from: PokerWorld365 on June 04, 2023, 10:31:52 AM[/url][/center]I was waiting for Stake.com to start their Poker game but here another new site that focus In poker gaming in which for me is valid because we have many Pplayers available here in Bitcointalk .But like the question above , is this only for mobile?Quote from: slapper on June 04, 2023, 10:22:22 PMSo, your digital stomping ground is housed in a mobile app, much like PokerStars, only with the added sparkle of Bitcoin for deposits - you can snag it on Playstore and Appstore, correct? A little touch-up here could help your users jump right into your app without a hiccup. Good luck with your gig, champ! Eager to see your moves in the face of these questions and pointers.Seems all valid mate, Hope that OP will answer or address this post of yours because all those details are needed to be answered for them to gain trust from our community here.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Welcome to the forum. As I see it the project would be to try to make the site the reference of poker with cryptocurrencies, something like Pokerstars but in this area. Quote from: Chikito on June 05, 2023, 01:16:48 AMThis is a fresh gambling site where domain create a month ago, and I am pretty sure they still don't have an application like link download, login button, Toc, and faq. This site still has to develop. PokerWorld365 is try to sell the name first and uses a curious trick to make you come to their site. but, if not fast and late to make it able to play, the user will forget this. Better for to OP make test mode before make it able to download.Badly done, then. It would be better to have the product finished or almost finished and then launch it. OP, consider including these details if you want to be perceived as a serious casino by the most veteran members of this forum. comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: We have to download it ? Do you mean it‚Äôs an app ? Mate here you only lost half of the traffic that would have atleast check your site. Gambling apps are banned in both ios and playstore. So this means, you will prompt us to download it from third party services, and hence there are risk of getting hacked. So yes no one will download the app to be honest. It would have been great if you could have launched the platform in web based applications. May we know the reason for launching mobile applications?
